definition: the act of terminating a project or procedure before it is completed, to terminate a pregnancy by undergoing an abortion
details:
noun
- the act of terminating a project or procedure before it is completed
= example: the act of terminating a project or procedure before it is completed
verb
- to terminate a pregnancy by undergoing an abortion
= example: to terminate a pregnancy by undergoing an abortion
- to cease development, die, and be aborted
= example: to cease development, die, and be aborted
- to terminate before completion
= example: to terminate before completion
